basics.name: Keerthi Reddy Nalla
basics.label: Computer Science Grad | Data Analyst & Data Science Enthusiast
basics.summary: I'm Keerthi Reddy Nalla, a Btech Computer Science student at Lovely Professional University, Punjab, driven by a passion for data visualization I specialize in Data Science and Visualization. Proven ability turn raw data into clearer and actionable insights using tools python, Power BI, Tableau, and Excel. Eager to apply data visualization skills to drive informed decision-making.
basics.contactText: I'm open to data science intership opportunities and collaborative projects. Feel free to reach out!

projects.name: Guessing Game with Python
projects.description: Developed a Python-based number guessing game where players attempt to guess a randomly generated number. Implemented an infinite gameplay loop, allowing users to play multiple rounds while keeping track of their total guesses. Designed a scoring system that records the number of attempts per game and updates the player's final score based on correct guesses. Utilized Python’s random module to generate unpredictable numbers, ensuring a dynamic gaming experience.

projects.name: Blood Donors Website
projects.description: Developed a dynamic web platform to manage and connect blood donors with recipients in need. Implemented user registration and authentication, allowing individuals to sign up as blood donors and manage their profiles. Designed an intuitive search functionality, enabling users to find donors based on blood type, location, and availability. Built the website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring a responsive and user-friendly interface.

projects.name: FIFA 2019 World Cup Power BI Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to analyze FIFA 2019 World Cup data, showcasing match results, player performance, and team statistics through dynamic visualizations and actionable insights.

projects.name: COVID Data Analysis using MS Excel
projects.description: Analyzed COVID-19 datasets using MS Excel, employing PivotTables and charts to uncover trends, validate data accuracy, and create visual reports highlighting regional comparisons and key insights.

certifications.name: Python for Data Science, AI & Development
